original_text: The people walked about and they picked it up from the ground. They used stones to make it into flour. Or they beat it with a stick. They boiled it in pots, and they made cakes with it. The taste of the cakes was like olive oil.
korean_text: 백성이 두루 다니며 그것을 거두어 맷돌에 갈기도 하며 절구에 찧기도 하고 가마에 삶기도 하여 과자를 만들었으니 그 맛이 기름 섞은 과자 맛 같았더라

sentences.original_text: and they picked it up from the ground
They used stones to make it into flour
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 돌을 사용하여 그것을 가루로 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: Or they beat it with a stick
and they made cakes with it
